text: Musalole kuti anthu olemera ndi olemekezeka amene ali pakati panu kuti alumbire kuti sadzapereka chithandizo kwa abale awo, kwa anthu osauka ndiponso kwa iwo amene adathawa ku midzi yawo chifukwa cha nkhani zokhudza Mulungu. Iwo ayenera kuwakhululukira ndi kuwalekerera. Kodi inu simufuna kuti Mulungu akukhululukireni? Mulungu ndi Mwini chikhululukiro ndiponso Mwini chisoni chosatha
